name: The Magic Bulldozer (CSG at TU)
description:
University of Tulsa - Student Portfolio Piece

Title: The Magic Bulldozer
Platform: Android App
Genre: Action
Rating: E
Target Market: 6+

Simulation Overview:

The Magic Bulldozer is a game where you shoot dumptrucks to try to save animals without getting destroyed.

Unlock new modes, try out different settings and try to beat your own high scores!

Try out impossible mode where the difficulty is exponentially spiked!

Published/Updated Date: 2020

Game Designer

  • Sam Locicero
